titleStmt.title: A discourse of the Pope's supremacy. Part I in answer to a treatise intitled, St. Peter's supremacy faithfully discuss'd ... : and to A sermon of S. Peter, preached ... by Thomas Godden ...
titleStmt.author: Stratford, Nicholas, 1633-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
